title.abbrev: Separation of Flow Control and Reliability Checking in the Transport Layer

front.title: Separation of Flow Control and Reliability Checking in the Transport Layer

abstract.t: This document defines an architectural design of the transport layer. In particular, this specifies the separation of flow control and reliability in the transport layer. The flow control and the reliability functions are separated with each other. The flow control function is implemented upon the network layer and the reliability function is over the flow control function.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document defines an architectural design of the transport layer.
The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.
